Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 208, \u0016728 (cust.raw_text: Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 208, 728 (custody and modification of custody orders)
Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 208, \u0016728 (cust.proposition: Jurisdiction and venue are proper in the Bristol County Probate and Family Court pursuant to Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 208, 728 (custody and modification of custody orders), and the rules governing the Probate and Family Court.

Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 76, \u001671 (compul.raw_text: Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 76, 71 (compulsory attendance and educational obligations)
Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 76, \u001671 (compul.proposition: (Representative statutory and case authority regarding modification, best-interest analysis, school attendance, and the courts power to allocate educational decision-making and modify parenting time includes, but is not limited to: Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 208, 728; Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 76, 71 (compulsory attendance and educational obligations); Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 119, 751A (reporting obligations concerning child welfare); and applicable Massachusetts cases interpreting those statutes and the standard for modification and best interests of the child.
